description: A WSGI OAuth for working with OAuth from the consumer and service providerperspective. Contains a middleware for protected WSGI applications with anassociated administration application. Provides a simple library to helpconsumers integrate OAuth protected resources into their applications.

info.Author:: Michael Mulich | WebLion Group, Penn State University

longdescription: A WSGI OAuth for working with OAuth from the consumer and service providerperspective. Contains a middleware for protected WSGI applications with anassociated administration application. Provides a simple library to helpconsumers integrate OAuth protected resources into their applications.
